remarks: Two equivalent expressions for double "at most one."  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 2-Nov-2019.)
statement:
2mo $p |- ( E. z E. w A. x A. y ( ph -> ( x = z /\ y = w ) ) <-> A. x A. y A. z A. w ( ( ph /\ [ z / x ] [ w / y ] ph ) -> ( x = z /\ y = w ) ) ) $.
$d ph w z $.
$d w x y z $.
